name: Tokyo Rhythm Fighter
description:
CONTROLS:


PLAYER 1PLAYER 2MOVEA,DLEFT, RIGHT arrowsHIGH BLOCK/ATTACKWUP arrowLOW BLOCK/ATTACKSDOWN arrow

MOVE AND ATTACK ON THE BEAT!

PRESS HIGH/LOW ONCE TO POSITION/BLOCK, 

PRESS AGAIN TO ATTACK 

R TO RESTART
